post.summary: InitiateUpload returns a strategy and information to upload debug info for a given build_id.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: InitiateUploadRequest is the request to initiate an upload.

post.summary: MarkUploadFinished marks the upload as finished for a given build_id.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: MarkUploadFinishedRequest is the request to mark an upload as finished.

post.summary: ShouldInitiateUpload returns whether an upload for a given build_id should be initiated or not.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: ShouldInitiateUploadRequest is the request for ShouldInitiateUpload.

post.summary: Upload ingests debug info for a given build_id

UploadInstructionsUploadStrategy.description:
The strategy to use for uploading.

 - UPLOAD_STRATEGY_UNSPECIFIED: The upload is not allowed.
 - UPLOAD_STRATEGY_GRPC: The upload is allowed and should be done via the Upload RPC.
 - UPLOAD_STRATEGY_SIGNED_URL: The upload is allowed and should be done via a returned signed URL.

info.title: info is the metadata for the debug info

chunkData.title: chunk_data is the raw bytes of the debug info

buildId.title: build_id is a unique identifier for the debug data

size.title: size is the number of bytes of the debug info

parcadebuginfov1alpha1UploadResponse.title: UploadResponse returns the build_id and the size of the uploaded debug info

v1alpha1BuildIDType.description:
BuildIDType is the type of build ID.

 - BUILD_ID_TYPE_UNKNOWN_UNSPECIFIED: The build ID is unknown.
 - BUILD_ID_TYPE_GNU: The build ID is a GNU build ID.
 - BUILD_ID_TYPE_HASH: The build ID is an opaque hash.
 - BUILD_ID_TYPE_GO: The build ID is a Go build ID.
 - BUILD_ID_TYPE_SOURCE_MAP_DEBUG_ID: The build ID is a debug ID for source maps (UUID format).

v1alpha1DebuginfoType.description:
Types of debuginfo.

 - DEBUGINFO_TYPE_DEBUGINFO_UNSPECIFIED: The default type that the API always supported. This type is expected to
contain debuginfos for symbolizaton purposes.
 - DEBUGINFO_TYPE_EXECUTABLE: The type to identify executables. This is meant to be used for
disassembling so it is expected to contain executable `.text` section.
 - DEBUGINFO_TYPE_SOURCES: The type to identify a source tarball. This is expected to contain
multiple source files that debuginfo references. It is meant to show code
with profiling data inline.
 - DEBUGINFO_TYPE_SOURCE_MAP: The type to identify JavaScript/TypeScript source maps. This is meant to
be used for mapping minified JavaScript locations back to original source
code positions.

buildId.description: The build_id of the debug info to upload.

size.description: The size of the debug info to upload.

hash.description: Hash of the debuginfo to upload.

force.description: Force uploading even if valid debuginfos are already available.

type.description: Type of debuginfo to propose uploading.

uploadInstructions.description: UploadInstructions contains the instructions for the client to upload the debuginfo.

buildId.description: The build_id of the debug info to mark as finished.

v1alpha1ShouldInitiateUploadRequest.description: ShouldInitiateUploadRequest is the request for ShouldInitiateUpload.

reason.description: Reason for why an upload should be initiated or not.

v1alpha1ShouldInitiateUploadResponse.description: ShouldInitiateUploadResponse is the response for ShouldInitiateUpload.

type.title: the type of debuginfo that's being uploaded

v1alpha1UploadInfo.title: UploadInfo contains the build_id and other metadata for the debug data

buildId.description: The build ID of the debuginfo to upload.

uploadId.description: The upload_id to use for uploading.

signedUrl.description:
The signed url to use for uploading using a PUT request when the upload
strategy is SIGNED_STRATEGY_URL.

type.description: Type of debuginfo the upload instructions are for.

v1alpha1UploadInstructions.description: UploadInstructions contains the instructions for the client to upload debuginfo.
